sql-select.name: GetListOfDatabaseObjectTypes
sql-select.sql-select-text:
SET NOCOUNT ON; SET DEADLOCK_PRIORITY LOW;
SELECT tSO.[xtype] AS [NodeUName] ,tSO.[xtype] AS [NodeUId] ,1 AS [NodeEnabled] ,CASE WHEN tSO.[xtype] IN (N'U') THEN N'UserTableIcon' ELSE N'GeneralIcon' END AS [NodeUIcon] ,N'#808080' AS [NodeFontColor] ,N'normal' AS [NodeFontStyle] ,tSO.[xtype] AS [XTypeId] ,tSO.[xtype] AS [XTypeName] FROM [dbo].[sysobjects] tSO WHERE tSO.[xtype] = ISNULL(@ObjectType, tSO.[xtype]) GROUP BY tSO.[xtype] ORDER BY tSO.[xtype] ;

SET NOCOUNT ON; SET DEADLOCK_PRIORITY LOW;
SELECT tSO.[type_desc] AS [NodeUName] ,tSO.[type] AS [NodeUId] ,1 AS [NodeEnabled] ,CASE WHEN tSO.[type] IN (N'U') THEN N'UserTableIcon' ELSE N'GeneralIcon' END AS [NodeUIcon] ,N'#808080' AS [NodeFontColor] ,N'normal' AS [NodeFontStyle] ,tSO.[type] AS [XTypeId] ,tSO.[type_desc] AS [XTypeName] FROM [sys].[objects] tSO WHERE tSO.[type] = ISNULL(@ObjectType, tSO.[type]) GROUP BY tSO.[type_desc] ,tSO.[type] ORDER BY tSO.[type_desc] ;
